So our model are simple in our regression model was able to do a wonderful job at predicting new observations. However just remember that the reason why we get such a good regression line here is simply because there was a linear relationship in the data set between the features and the dependent variable of the data set other words we had a perfectly linear dataset.

In other words we had a dataset with linear correlations and what I want to make sure you understand is that these results won't happen for any dataset, because of course you'll get to work on data with non-linear relationships. And for these data you will need a nonlinear model.
